articles.title: Welcome to Simulation of Ecological Data
articles.description: Simulations of ecological data for validating, teaching, and understanding models.
articles.contents:
Hello! My name is Andrew MacDonald; currently a Profesionel de
Recherche at the Université de Sherbrooke. This website is a collection
of notes taken during my work with reserchers in the ecology research
group, CREUS. These notes are informal, and usually show the whole
scientific process, with all its imperfections and errors. Every so
often in this work, I find something I wish I could tell more people –
or something I hope I never forget. I take such things and write about
them here.
